description: Image + illuminated frame: 32.4 x 21.3 cm. Mounted: 51.4 x 41.3 cm. Gouache and gold on paper; portrait is framed in illuminated borders; mounted on cardboard. Entire piece framed in modern black frame with ivory matting and glass. Dated Ramaḍān 1084 H [December 1673 or January 1674].
author: Muṣavvir, Muʻīn, b. ca. 1617
abstract: Portrait of the famous Persian miniaturist Riz̤ā ʻAbbāsī by his student Muʻīn Muṣavvir. The subject wears spectacles and is holding a picture of a European which he is painting, with the implements of his craft spread around him (description by Moghadam).
extent: 1 painting on paper : gouache and gold ; image 18.7 x 10.3 cm.
creator: Muṣavvir, Muʻīn, b. ca. 1617
مصور، معىن، b. ca. 1617
subject: Riz̤ā-ʼi ʻAbbāsī, Āqā, approximately 1570-1635?—Portraits—Specimens
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
